description: The highway ahead is blocked by a massive pileup. Dozens of cars crashed into each other. {SURVIVOR1} slows while {SURVIVOR2} scans the wrecks, the {RELATIONSHIP} knowing they'll need to find a way through or around.

choices.text: Push through the wreckage slowly
{ROLE1_CAP} searches for an alternate route
Abandon vehicle temporarily and scout ahead on foot
{SURVIVOR1} and {SURVIVOR2} search the wrecked cars for supplies

description: A lone survivor steps into the road, waving frantically. {SURVIVOR1} eases off the gas while {SURVIVOR2} reaches for their weapon. The stranger looks exhausted, and the {RELATIONSHIP} can't tell if this is a plea or a setup.

choices.text: Stop and help them
{ROLE1_CAP} studies their body language from a distance
Toss them a small bag of food without stopping
Keep driving – the {RELATIONSHIP} can’t risk it

description: Gunshots crack through the air. Figures rise from behind overturned cars as {SURVIVOR1} slams the brakes. {SURVIVOR2} ducks instinctively. The {RELATIONSHIP} are caught in a well-planned ambush with nowhere obvious to go.

choices.text: {ROLE1_CAP} leans out and returns fire immediately
Open fire with whatever weapons you have
Throw supplies out the window and hope they let you go
{ROLE1_CAP} shouts back, trying to calm things down
{SURVIVOR1} floors it and tries to break through

description: A jackknifed semi blocks most of the lanes ahead, its trailer split open and cargo spilled everywhere. {SURVIVOR2} spots movement under the trailer as {SURVIVOR1} brings the vehicle to a crawl.

choices.text: Weave slowly through the debris
{SURVIVOR2} dismounts and guides the vehicle through on foot
{ROLE1_CAP} looks for a side road or service track
Turn back and find a longer detour

description: A narrow mountain pass winds ahead with a rockslide partially blocking the road. Fog clings to the cliff face. {SURVIVOR1} can feel the edge dropping away just beyond the guardrail while {SURVIVOR2} peers into the mist.

choices.text: Try to squeeze past the rocks with careful driving
Spend time clearing just enough rocks to pass
{ROLE1_CAP} scouts on foot for a safer path around the slide
Backtrack to a wider road, accepting the delay

description: A fallen tree lies across a lonely country road. Wind whistles through open fields as {SURVIVOR1} brakes and the {RELATIONSHIP} step out, feeling suddenly exposed under the wide sky.

choices.text: Work together to push or drag the tree aside
{ROLE1_CAP} methodically cuts and clears branches (improv tools)
Drive slowly around through the field
Turn around and take the last junction you passed

description: A small group has set up a makeshift camp at an abandoned rest area. Smoke curls from a barrel fire as {SURVIVOR2} spots watchful eyes on the roof. The {RELATIONSHIP} could use allies—or at least information.

choices.text: Park in the open and approach with empty hands
{ROLE1_CAP} offers to trade supplies for information
Watch them from a distance, then move on
Offer to share a meal and news of the road

description: A battered SUV sits at the curb with its hood up. A pair of survivors argue quietly beside it as {SURVIVOR1} slows. {SURVIVOR2} can see fear and desperation in their faces as they spot the approaching vehicle.

choices.text: {ROLE1_CAP} offers to help fix their vehicle
Trade fuel for food or information
Offer to take one of them with you for a while
The {RELATIONSHIP} agree you can’t afford to stop

description: Rain starts as a drizzle and turns into a pounding storm. Wipers smear mud across the windshield. {SURVIVOR1} leans forward to see while {SURVIVOR2} watches the flooded shoulders nervously.

choices.text: Keep driving slowly with headlights on
Pull over and wait out the worst of it
{ROLE1_CAP} checks maps or notes for higher ground routes
Push through aggressively to make up time

description: Snow begins to fall, light at first, then heavier. The road ahead vanishes into white as {SURVIVOR2} rubs frost from the side window. The {RELATIONSHIP} can feel the temperature dropping fast inside the cab.

choices.text: Fit chains or improv traction and crawl forward
Look for a building or overhang to shelter in
{ROLE1_CAP} hikes ahead to check if the pass is still open
Turn back toward lower, safer roads

description: Dark clouds tower on the horizon. Wind buffets the vehicle as siren-like howls cut across the flatlands. {SURVIVOR1} spots a twisting column dropping from the clouds straight toward the highway.

choices.text: Try to outrun the storm front
Abandon vehicle temporarily and take cover in a ditch
Look for an underpass or sturdy structure to hide beneath
Stay in the vehicle and ride it out together

description: The vehicle lurches and a harsh grinding sound fills the cabin. {SURVIVOR1} pulls over as smoke curls from under the hood. The {RELATIONSHIP} trade a worried look—this road is too exposed for a long stop.

choices.text: Pop the hood and do a quick inspection
{ROLE1_CAP} methodically checks and repairs what they can
Ignore the warning signs and keep driving
Use the stop to rest briefly and let the engine cool

description: Heat shimmers off the asphalt. The temperature gauge creeps into the red as {SURVIVOR2} wipes sweat from their brow. The engine coughs and the {RELATIONSHIP} feel the power fading.

choices.text: Stop in the shade of a wreck or sign and let the engine cool
{ROLE1_CAP} rigs an improvised cooling fix
Push the engine hard to reach the next town
Walk ahead a while while the engine rests

description: Midway across a long bridge, the engine sputters and dies. The vehicle rolls to a stop with water on both sides. {SURVIVOR1} curses as {SURVIVOR2} eyes the narrowing lines of sight behind you.

choices.text: Try to restart the engine repeatedly
{ROLE1_CAP} climbs out to attempt a detailed fix under pressure
The {RELATIONSHIP} get out to push while steering
Abandon the vehicle and cross the bridge on foot

description: A fresh rockslide has scattered boulders down the hillside. Some still shift and tumble. {SURVIVOR2} flinches as gravel rattles across the roof while {SURVIVOR1} brakes hard.

choices.text: Wait for the hillside to settle before moving
Crawl along hugging the inside rock wall
{ROLE1_CAP} walks ahead marking a safer path between the rocks
Turn back before the slide gets worse

description: The road dips into a low underpass completely filled with muddy water. Floating debris bumps against submerged cars. {SURVIVOR1} can't see the road surface at all while {SURVIVOR2} studies the flow.

choices.text: Risk driving straight through the floodwater
Walk in and probe depth with a stick first
{ROLE1_CAP} searches maps for a longer, higher detour
Wait hours for the water level to drop

description: A flicker of light glows in the distance—a half-lit truck stop sign still humming with weak power. {SURVIVOR2} points excitedly as {SURVIVOR1} slows, the {RELATIONSHIP} weighing risk against opportunity.

choices.text: Search the truck stop thoroughly
Go straight for the fuel pumps and move on
{ROLE1_CAP} checks the shop interior while the other keeps watch
It feels wrong—skip it and keep driving

description: The road skirts a ridge with a wide overlook. In the distance, {SURVIVOR2} spots what might be smoke from a settlement. The view could reveal the layout of the land ahead—if the {RELATIONSHIP} risk stopping.

choices.text: Pull over and scan the horizon with binoculars or scope
{ROLE1_CAP} studies the terrain to mark safer future routes
Note the smoke but keep moving
Head off the main road toward the smoke to investigate

description: As the vehicle crawls between tall, empty buildings, a metal cable snaps up across the road. Tires squeal. {SURVIVOR1} slams the brakes just as figures lean out of shattered windows aiming rifles down.

choices.text: Throw it in reverse and try to back out of the kill zone
{ROLE1_CAP} targets the apparent leaders first
{ROLE1_CAP} yells an offer of supplies for safe passage
Abandon the vehicle and sprint into a side alley

description: A makeshift barricade of cars and barbed wire blocks the road ahead. Before {SURVIVOR1} can reverse, raiders step out from the tree line with shotguns leveled. {SURVIVOR2} counts at least five shapes in the shadows.

choices.text: {ROLE1_CAP} claims you have almost nothing to steal
Try to ram the barricade and burst through
{ROLE1_CAP} lays down covering fire while driving through a gap
Hand over a portion of supplies and hope they’re satisfied

description: The road dips and curves—then the headlights catch them. Dozens of shambling shapes clog the lanes ahead. By the time {SURVIVOR1} reacts, the horde has already begun to close in around the vehicle.

choices.text: Floor it and try to plow through the horde
Reverse and try to escape the way you came
{ROLE1_CAP} leans out and fires into the densest cluster
Abandon the road and scramble down the embankment on foot

description: Inside the tunnel, sound multiplies. The engine echoes off concrete—along with distant moans. When brake lights flare ahead, {SURVIVOR2} realizes too late the tunnel is jammed with corpses that begin to move.

choices.text: Reverse at full speed, bouncing off stalled cars if needed
Abandon the vehicle and fight through the tunnel on foot
Climb over the jammed cars, avoiding direct fights where possible
Retreat and try to block the tunnel entrance behind you

description: A long line of abandoned cars leads into a low dip in the road. As the {RELATIONSHIP} inch forward, heads begin to rise between the vehicles. The horde was sleeping in the shade.

choices.text: Perform a fast U-turn and flee
Crawl forward as quietly as possible, minimal noise
{ROLE1_CAP} tosses noise-making decoys to draw them away
Cut across a nearby field, avoiding the jam entirely

description: At a tight bend, a pickup blocks the outside lane and locals with hunting rifles step out from the treeline. Their faces are hard and territorial. {SURVIVOR1} feels the drop-off to the side and the trap closing.

choices.text: {ROLE1_CAP} asks about their rules and offers to pay a toll
Edge past them dangerously close to the cliff
{ROLE1_CAP} steps out visibly armed but not aiming, asserting strength
Carefully reverse down the switchback out of range

description: As the vehicle enters the toll plaza, floodlights flare to life from a generator. Armed survivors step out from booths, weapons aimed. The gates slam shut behind you, trapping the {RELATIONSHIP} in the lanes.

choices.text: {ROLE1_CAP} quickly offers a heavy toll of supplies
Ram the front gate and try to break out
Open fire on the nearest booths and sprint for the exit
Climb the toll structure and escape over the side on foot

description: As night falls, eyes glint on the roadside. A pack of feral dogs sprints from the ditch, leaping at the car doors when {SURVIVOR1} slows. {SURVIVOR2} hears snarls and claws scraping metal.

choices.text: Accelerate and try to outrun the pack
Lean out and fire warning shots into the air
Stay inside, keep still, and wait for them to lose interest
Open a door briefly and try to scare them off at close range
